1558900912_17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92T.body: while it's true that most suicide by young people is the result of chemical imbalances and impulsive emotionally driven actions, this is not always the case. i'm convinced there is nothing wrong whatsoever about me wanting to die. i will likely commit suicide within the next 10 years. chemical imbalances won't weigh into it at all. i agree though that most young people who feel suicidal would benefit greatly from therapy or other treatment so they can live the best years of their lives.
